masterGrammar.rule: rule {DP option Pron - possessives, reflexives and reciprocals} DP = Pron <DP head> = <Pron head> {<Pron head type possessive> = + /<Pron head type reflexive> = + /<Pron head type reciprocal> = + } <DP option> = Pron

rule {DP option noNF - pronoun,dem,quantifiers w/ optional partitive PP after} DP = {Pron / Dem / Q / Num / Deg} (PP) <DP head> = <Pron head> <Pron head type possessive> = - <Pron head type reflexive> = - <Pron head type reciprocal> = - <DP head> = <Dem head> <DP head> = <Q head> <DP head> = <Num head> <DP head> = <Deg head> <Deg head type quantifier> = + <Dem head type wh > = - <PP head type stranded> = - <PP head type sentential> = -
<DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type suffix poss> = - <DP head type suffix> <= <PP head type suffix> <Pron head> == ~[case:genitive] <DP option> = noNF

rule {DP option noNI - pronoun,dem,quantifiers w/ optional partitive PP before} DP = (PP) {Pron / Dem / Q / Num / Deg} <DP head> = <Pron head> <Pron head type possessive> = - | these use DP rule "Pron" <Pron head type reflexive> = - <Pron head type reciprocal> = - <DP head> = <Dem head> <DP head> = <Q head> <DP head> = <Num head> <DP head> = <Deg head> <Deg head type quantifier> = + <Dem head type wh > = - | so "which" not separate <PP head type stranded> = - | PP must have overt complement <PP head type sentential> = - | sentential not within NP | <PP head type partitive> = + <DP head type prefix poss> = - |can't be possessors <DP head type suffix poss> = - |can't be possessors <DP head type prefix> <= <PP head type prefix> <Pron head> == ~[case:genitive] <DP option> = noNI

rule {DP option 1 - modifiers initial} DP = Deg {D' / D''} <DP head> = <D' head> <DP head> = <D'' head> <Deg head type modifies_NP> = + <Deg head agr> = <D' head agr> <DP head> == ~[case:genitive] |Deg not w/in possessor <DP head type prefix> <= <Deg head type prefix> <DP option> = 1

rule {DP option 2 - modifiers final} DP = {D' / D''} Deg <DP head> = <D' head> <DP head> = <D'' head> <Deg head type modifies_NP> = + <Deg head agr> = <D' head agr> <DP head> == ~[case:genitive] |Deg not w/in possessor <DP head type suffix> <= <Deg head type suffix> <DP option> = 2

rule {DP option 3 - modifiers both sides} DP = Deg_1 {D' / D''} Deg_2 <DP head> = <D' head> <DP head> = <D'' head> <Deg_1 head agr> = <D' head agr> <Deg_2 head agr> = <D' head agr> <Deg_1 head type modifies_NP> = + <Deg_2 head type modifies_NP> = + <Deg_1 head type DP-initial> = + <Deg_2 head type DP-final> = + <DP head> == ~[case:genitive] |Deg not w/in possessor <DP head type prefix> <= <Deg_1 head type prefix> <DP head type suffix> <= <Deg_2 head type suffix> <DP option> = 3
rule {DBarBar option 1f - relative clause CP final} D'' = D' CP <D'' head> = <D' head> <CP head type relative> = + <D'' head type suffix> <= <CP head type suffix> <DBarBar option> = 1f
rule {DBarBar option 1i - relative clause CP initial} D'' = CP D' <D'' head> = <D' head> <CP head type relative> = + <D'' head type prefix> <= <CP head type prefix> <DBarBar option> = 1i
rule {DBarBar option 2f - relative clause IP final} D'' = D' IP <D'' head> = <D' head> <IP head type relative> = + <D'' head type suffix> <= <IP head type suffix> <DBarBar option> = 2f
rule {DBarBar option 2i - relative clause IP initial} D'' = IP D' <D'' head> = <D' head> <IP head type relative> = + <D'' head type prefix> <= <IP head type prefix> <DBarBar option> = 2i
rule {DBar option 1 - no determiners} D' = NP <D' head> = <NP head> <DBar option> = 1
rule {DBar option 1poss - no determiners with possessed} D' = NP <D' head> = <NP head> <NP head type possessed> = + <DBar option> = 1poss

rule {DBar option 2a - only articles, initial, optional} D' = (Art) NP <D' head> = <NP head> <Art head agr> = <NP head agr> <D' head type wh> <= <Art head type wh> <D' head type prefix> <= <Art head type prefix> <DBar option> = 2a
